page.title: 05FEARS FOR THE FUTURE
page.content: People are becoming increasingly worried because{oil}companies are wanting to{drill}in this part of Sussex.They are afraid that it will ruin the countryside. As{Gatwick}is gradually getting {bigger}people in the villages worry about{increased housing}development. { Big houses}are being{split}up and sold as lots because people can't afford the upkeep of them and their grounds.It will{ruin our heritage. { Warninglid}has{no shop}as the Old Smithy was sold last year as a private house. It is difficult for those who don't drive as there are{no buses}at the {weekend}and they only run{2 hourly in {the week finishing at approx. 5 p.m. The{homes of some of our wildlife are {disappearing}as woodland is cleared for housing & farmers uproot hedges.
